name: Weekly Biosecurity Briefing
prompt: You are a newsletter writer. Write a concise, engaging weekly briefing covering the most important recent developments in biosecurity, pandemic preparedness, and synthetic biology governance. Include 4-6 items. For each item, write 2-3 sentences summarizing what happened and why it matters. End with a "Worth watching" section with 1-2 emerging stories. Keep the total length under 800 words. Use a professional but accessible tone.
